products.description: Secure and scalable payment processing platform that supports online and in-person payments globally. Helps businesses of all sizes accept credit cards, wallets, and other payment methods seamlessly. Enables faster revenue collection with built-in fraud detection and multi-currency support.

Subscription and invoicing platform for automating recurring revenue management. Helps companies manage complex billing scenarios with features like usage-based pricing, invoicing, and revenue recognition. Streamlines cash flow and improves customer retention with automated renewals and dunning.

Comprehensive solution for building and scaling marketplaces and platforms with multi-party payments. Enables businesses to onboard sellers, route payments, and manage compliance easily. Ideal for platforms that need to pay out to third parties securely and efficiently.

Machine learning-powered fraud detection tool that protects businesses from fraudulent payments. Helps reduce chargebacks and losses by automatically identifying and blocking suspicious transactions. Continuously improves security with insights from Stripe’s global network.

Platform for creating, managing, and distributing physical and virtual payment cards. Helps businesses control expenses, rewards programs, and streamline payments. Supports real-time authorization controls and detailed transaction data for better spend management.

In-person payment solution providing SDKs and pre-certified card readers for seamless offline transactions. Enables businesses to accept payments face-to-face with built-in PCI compliance and real-time reconciliation. Ideal for retail, events, and pop-up shops seeking unified payment experience.

Banking-as-a-service platform that enables businesses to embed financial services like bank accounts, funds transfers, and cash management. Helps marketplaces and platforms offer seamless money movement options and enhance customer experiences. Provides access to FDIC-insured accounts via Stripe’s banking partners.

End-to-end toolkit for starting and scaling an online business globally. Helps entrepreneurs incorporate a company, open a bank account, and get legal and tax guidance quickly. Simplifies international expansion and fundraising with Stripe’s business infrastructure.

Optional product that enables businesses to direct a portion of revenue to fund carbon removal projects. Helps companies meet sustainability goals and demonstrate corporate social responsibility. Integrates easily with existing Stripe payments for automatic contributions.

Automated tax calculation, collection, and reporting solution for global sales tax, VAT, and GST compliance. Helps businesses reduce tax burden by accurately managing taxes across multiple jurisdictions. Integrates with Stripe payments and billing for seamless tax operations.

Invoice creation and management platform for sending professional, customizable invoices to business customers. Helps automate invoice delivery, tracking, and payments with built-in online payment links. Ideal for businesses seeking efficient B2B billing and faster payments.

Business financing solution offering fast, flexible funding based on payment volume. Helps businesses access growth capital with simple repayment tied to sales performance. Supports scaling operations without traditional loan hassles or credit checks.
